body_html:
I suspect, but don't really know for sure, that some of the direct issues that prompted this feature request would be relieved if I simply had the authority to enforce dropout in the last layer. It seems this could be achieved by adding another argument (say, "DropoutLastLayer") and defaulting it to false to preserve existing code.

I don't really know if that would interact badly with the packed sequences, though.
